Table.tableFooter: DMARD, disease-modifying antirheumatic drug; EULAR, European League Against Rheumatism; NA, not available; RA, rheumatoid arthritis.aThe scoring system is described in Materials and methods, Additional immunohistochemical data for patient 10.
